title: Coverage
description: Insurance or medical plan or a payment agreement.(Based on HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

xdm:identifier.title: Identifier
xdm:identifier.description: The identifier of the coverage as issued by the insurer.

xdm:paymentBy.title: Payment By
xdm:paymentBy.description: Link to the paying party and optionally what specifically they will be responsible to pay.

xdm:party.title: Party
xdm:party.description: The list of parties providing non-insurance payment for the treatment costs.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: The type of coverage: social program, medical plan, accident coverage (workers compensation, auto), group health or payment by an individual or organization.

xdm:policyHolder.title: Policy Holder
xdm:policyHolder.description: The party who 'owns' the insurance policy.

xdm:subscriber.title: Subscriber
xdm:subscriber.description: The party who has signed-up for or 'owns' the contractual relationship to the policy or to whom the benefit of the policy for services rendered to them or their family is due..

xdm:subscriberId.title: Subscriber Identifier
xdm:subscriberId.description: The insurer assigned ID for the Subscriber.

xdm:beneficiary.title: Plan Beneficiary
xdm:beneficiary.description: The party who benefits from the insurance coverage; the patient when products and/or services are provided.

xdm:dependent.title: Dependent number
xdm:dependent.description: A designator for a dependent under the coverage.

xdm:relationship.title: Beneficiary Relationship
xdm:relationship.description: The relationship of beneficiary (patient) to the subscriber.

xdm:period.title: Coverage start and end dates.
xdm:period.description: Time period during which the coverage is in force. A missing start date indicates the start date isn't known, a missing end date means the coverage is continuing to be in force..

xdm:insurer.title: Insurer
xdm:insurer.description: The program or plan underwriter, payor, insurance company.

xdm:class.title: Class
xdm:class.description: A suite of underwriter specific classifiers.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: The type of classification for which an insurer-specific class label or number and optional name is provided. For example, type may be used to identify a class of coverage or employer group, policy, or plan.

xdm:value.title: Value
xdm:value.description: The alphanumeric identifier associated with the insurer issued label.

xdm:name.title: Name
xdm:name.description: A short description for the class.

xdm:network.title: Insurer Network
xdm:network.description: The insurer-specific identifier for the insurer-defined network of providers to which the beneficiary may seek treatment which will be covered at the 'in-network' rate, otherwise 'out of network' terms and conditions apply.

xdm:costToBeneficiary.title: Cost To Beneficiary
xdm:costToBeneficiary.description: A suite of codes indicating the cost category and associated amount which have been detailed in the policy and may have been included on the health card..

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: The category of patient centric costs associated with treatment..

xdm:category.title: Category
xdm:category.description: Code to identify the general type of benefits under which products and services are provided..

xdm:network.title: Network
xdm:network.description: Is a flag to indicate whether the benefits refer to in-network providers or out-of-network providers.

xdm:unit.title: Unit
xdm:unit.description: Indicates if the benefits apply to an individual or to the family.

xdm:term.title: Term
xdm:term.description: The term or period of the values such as 'maximum lifetime benefit' or 'maximum annual visits'.

xdm:valueQuantity.title: Value Quantity
xdm:valueQuantity.description: The amount due in percentage from the patient for the cost category.

xdm:valueMoney.title: Value Money
xdm:valueMoney.description: The amount due from the patient for the cost category.

xdm:exception.title: Exception
xdm:exception.description: A suite of codes indicating exceptions or reductions to patient costs and their effective periods.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: The code for the specific exception..

xdm:period.title: Period
xdm:period.description: The timeframe the exception is in force.

xdm:subrogation.title: Subrogation
xdm:subrogation.description: When 'subrogation=true' this insurance instance has been included not for adjudication but to provide insurers with the details to recover costs.

xdm:contract.title: Contract Details
xdm:contract.description: The policy(s) which constitute this insurance coverage.
The insurer assigned ID for the Subscriber.

xdm:insurancePlan.title: Insurance Plan
xdm:insurancePlan.description: The insurance plan details, benefits and costs, which constitute this insurance coverage.
